Australian Labor Party (NSW Branch); Fairfield RSL; Smithfield RSL; Marconi Club; Cabra-Vale Ex Servicemens Club; Ulladulla Ex Servicemens Club; Patron, Linwood House; Patron, Maltese Community of Australia in NSW

My 14 year old daughter has started a micro-business in partnership with a friend called "Gracita Soaps" (environmentally sustainable vegan soaps).

disclosures.entity: University of New England and the Earle Page College
disclosures.details: I have received a tie, a pair of whisky glasses and a commemorative book from the University of New England and the Earle Page College.
1) A constituent, Mr Adwar Rassam, painted my portrait and presented it to me. 2) Bottle of Johnnie Walker Blue Label Whisky from Diageo Australia marking the 200th anniversary of Johnnie Walker.
Book contract with Monash University Press.
Bottle of champagne from McKell Institute; Six pack of Little Creatures Pale Ale from Lion Brewing
2 tickets to the opening night of Hamlet at the Sydney Opera House courtesy of Bell Shakespeare.
